job.title: Sr. Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers Our client Savvyan Technologies is seeking the following Apply via Dice todayltbrgtltbrgtSr Software Engineer Santa Clara CA Client Silicon Valley Bank SVB Overall 15 years of experience in IT services Extensively knowledge on Commercial Banking domain Managing of end to end complex and large programs Should have handled large onshore and offshore teams Indepth technical knowledge and should design systems should able interpret complex designs Provide technical guidance to team Excellent communication skills both with internal and customer Proactive risk and mitigation management Strong analytical and problem solving skills Excellent technical knowledge and banking domain knowledge Experinece in determining and overseeing consistent developemnt testing evaluation and troubleshooting of all products in all stages of completion Experinece in Tracking milestones deliverables and change requests Experience with JIRA Confluence and SVN Experience in Java Spring framework  multithreading collections jdbc Hibernate etc Experience in deploying web servers Apache Tomcat Weblogic 12c and Openshiftdatabase servers and configure them Experience in sybase SQL and Oracle 19 Shall be able to createoptimize and Manage structure and building blocks of a database Capable to perform Root cause analysis from Log and debug L2 and L3 support Hands on on below Struts 1xStruts 2JAX WSJAXRSEJB MDBJMSANT
